snippet: The Justice Department said that it would allow members of federally recognized Indian tribes to possess eagle feathers — an issue of religious and cultural significance for the tribes.
abstract: Justice Department says it will allow members of federally recognized Indian tribes to possess eagle feathers, which is an issue of religious and cultural significance for tribes.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department said that it would allow members of federally recognized Indian tribes to possess eagle feathers — an issue of religious and cultural significance for the tribes.

headline.main: Indians Allowed to Have Eagle Feathers
headline.print_headline: Indians Allowed to Have Eagle Feathers
